elements.name: Create a new client profile with personal details
elements.description: A client should be able to create a profile with personal details such as age and fitness goals.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I create a profile with my personal details including age and fitness goals
my personal details should be saved successfully in my profile

elements.name: Update personal details in my profile
elements.description: A client should be able to update their personal details such as age and fitness goals.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I update my personal details such as age and fitness goals
my updated personal details should be saved successfully in my profile

elements.name: Set dietary preferences in my profile
elements.description: A client should be able to set dietary preferences or restrictions (e.g., vegetarian, gluten-free).

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I set my dietary preferences or restrictions (e.g., vegetarian, gluten-free)
my dietary preferences should be saved successfully in my profile

elements.name: Edit dietary preferences or restrictions
elements.description: A client should be able to edit dietary preferences or restrictions (e.g., add lactose intolerance).

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I edit my dietary preferences or restrictions (e.g., add lactose intolerance)
my edited dietary preferences should be updated successfully in my profile

elements.name: View personal details and dietary preferences
elements.description: A client should be able to view their personal details, fitness goals, and dietary preferences.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I view my profile
I should be able to see my personal details, fitness goals, and dietary preferences

elements.name: Attempt to create a profile with invalid details
elements.description: A client should not be able to create a profile with invalid data (e.g., non-numeric age).

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I attempt to create a profile with invalid details such as age = "abc"
I should see an error message indicating invalid input
my profile should not be saved

elements.name: Attempt to create a profile with missing mandatory details
elements.description: A client should not be able to create a profile without providing mandatory fields.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I attempt to create a profile without providing my age
I should see an error message indicating that age is required
my profile should not be saved

elements.name: Delete my profile
elements.description: A client should be able to delete their profile permanently.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I choose to delete my profile
my profile should be removed from the system
I should no longer be able to access my account

elements.name: Unauthorized access to another client's profile
elements.description: A user should not be able to view or edit another client's profile.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I attempt to access another client's profile
I should receive an error message indicating insufficient permissions
I should not be able to view or edit their profile

name: Account Management
description: Account Management should allow clients to create, update, and view their personal details and dietary preferences.

elements.name: Approve New Instructor
elements.description: Admin should be able to approve a new instructor registration after reviewing the details.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
there is a pending instructor registration
I review the registration details
I approve the new instructor registration
the instructor should be added to the system as an active user
I should see a success message confirming the approval

elements.name: Reject New Instructor
elements.description: Admin should be able to reject an instructor registration if they are not suitable.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
there is a pending instructor registration
I review the registration details
I reject the new instructor registration
the instructor should not be added to the system
I should see a rejection message confirming the action

elements.name: View Pending Instructor Registrations
elements.description: Admin should be able to see a list of pending instructor registrations for review.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I navigate to the "Pending Registrations" section
I should see a list of all pending instructor registrations
I should be able to review the details of each registration

elements.name: Notify Instructor After Approval
elements.description: The system should send a notification to the instructor after their registration is approved.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I approve a new instructor registration
the registration is approved
the instructor should receive a notification email confirming their approval
I should see a message confirming the email has been sent

elements.name: Notify Instructor After Rejection
elements.description: The system should notify the instructor if their registration is rejected.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I reject a new instructor registration
the registration is rejected
the instructor should receive a notification email about the rejection
I should see a message confirming the rejection email has been sent

name: Approve New Instructor Registrations
description: Admin should be able to review and approve new instructor registrations.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I approve a submitted fitness tip titled "5-Minute Stretching Routine"
the tip "5-Minute Stretching Routine" should be publicly visible on the platform
I am logged in as an admin
I reject a submitted fitness tip titled "5-Minute Stretching Routine" with reason "Lack of sufficient details"
the submitter should receive a notification "Lack of sufficient details"
the tip "5-Minute Stretching Routine" should not be publicly visible

elements.name: Delete a Publicly Visible Fitness Tip

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
the fitness tip "Beginner Yoga Postures" is publicly visible
I delete the fitness tip "Beginner Yoga Postures"
the tip "Beginner Yoga Postures" should no longer be visible on the platform

elements.name: View Feedback for a Fitness Tip

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I view feedback for the fitness tip titled "Home Workout Plan"
I should see all user comments and ratings for "Home Workout Plan"
I am logged in as an admin
there is a feedback comment "Inappropriate language" on the fitness tip titled "Healthy Morning Routine"
I remove the inappropriate feedback on "Healthy Morning Routine"
the feedback should no longer be visible under the "Healthy Morning Routine" tip
I am logged in as an admin
there is a feedback question "Can I do this routine with back pain?" on the fitness tip "5-Minute Stretching Routine"
I respond to the feedback with "Please consult a physician before attempting."
my response should be visible under the feedback question

elements.name: Rate a completed program
elements.description: A client should be able to rate a completed program.

steps.name: I have completed a program
I rate the program with a score of 5 stars
the rating should be saved successfully
I should be able to view my rating on the program page

elements.name: Write a review for a completed program
elements.description: A client should be able to write a review for a completed program.

steps.name: I have completed a program
I write a review with the content "Great program, helped me lose weight"
the review should be saved successfully
I should be able to view my review on the program page

elements.name: Submit a suggestion for improvement to an instructor
elements.description: A client should be able to submit a suggestion for improvement to an instructor.

steps.name: I have completed a program
I submit a suggestion with the content "Would love to have more flexibility in the schedule"
the suggestion should be saved successfully
the instructor should be notified of my suggestion

elements.name: View all ratings and reviews for a completed program
elements.description: A client should be able to view all ratings and reviews for a program.

steps.name: I have completed a program
I view the program page
I should be able to see all ratings and reviews from other clients

elements.name: Edit my review for a completed program
elements.description: A client should be able to edit a previously written review.

steps.name: I have completed a program
I have already written a review
I edit my review to change the content to "Excellent program, very helpful"
my review should be updated successfully
I should be able to see the updated review on the program page

elements.name: Submit a negative or inappropriate rating
elements.description: A client should be informed if their rating is deemed inappropriate or if they provide a rating below acceptable standards.

steps.name: I have completed a program
I rate the program with a score of 1 star and a comment "Terrible, didn't help me at all"
the rating should be flagged for review by the system
I should be notified that my rating is under review

elements.name: Write an inappropriate review
elements.description: A client should be informed if their review is deemed inappropriate or violates guidelines.

steps.name: I have completed a program
I write a review with content "This program was garbage!"
the review should be flagged as inappropriate
I should be notified that my review has been rejected due to inappropriate content

elements.name: Submit a duplicate review or rating
elements.description: A client should be informed if they try to submit a duplicate rating or review for the same program.

steps.name: I have already rated a program with 5 stars
I try to submit the same 5-star rating again
I should be informed that I have already rated this program
the system should not allow the duplicate rating or review

elements.name: Submit an incomplete or vague review
elements.description: A client should be informed if they submit a vague or incomplete review.

steps.name: I have completed a program
I submit a review with the content "Good program"
the system should prompt me to provide more details if the review is too vague
the review should not be saved until I provide a more detailed review

elements.name: Admin review of ratings and reviews before publishing
elements.description: The system should allow an admin to review and approve ratings and reviews before they are published.

steps.name: I have submitted a rating and review for a program
the admin reviews my rating and review
the admin should approve or reject the review based on guidelines
I should be notified if my review is published or rejected

name: Feedback and Reviews
description: Feedback and Reviews should allow clients to rate, review, and suggest improvements for completed programs.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I navigate to the "User Activity Dashboard"
I should see a summary of user activity
I am logged in as an admin

elements.name: Filter user activity by date range

steps.name: I am on the "User Activity Dashboard"
I select a date range from "<start_date>" to "<end_date>"
I click "Filter"
I should see the activity statistics for the selected date range
I am logged in as an admin

elements.name: Search for user activity by user ID

steps.name: I am on the "User Activity Dashboard"
I enter a user ID into the "Search by User ID" field
I click "Search"
I should see the activity details for the selected user
I am logged in as an admin

elements.name: Search for user activity by user name

steps.name: I am on the "User Activity Dashboard"
I enter a user name into the "Search by Name" field
I click "Search"
I should see the activity details for the selected user
I am logged in as an admin
I am on the "User Activity Dashboard"
I click "Export Report"
a downloadable report should be generated
the file name should include the current date in the format "User_Activity_Report_<yyyy-MM-dd>.csv"

name: Monitor user activity and engagement statistics
description:
As an admin
  I want to monitor user activity and engagement statistics
  So that I can make informed decisions about user management and platform improvements

elements.name: Browse programs by difficulty level
elements.description: A client should be able to browse programs by difficulty level.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I browse the programs and filter by difficulty level "Beginner"
I should see a list of programs with difficulty level "Beginner"

elements.name: Browse programs by focus area
elements.description: A client should be able to browse programs by focus area.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I browse the programs and filter by focus area "Weight Loss"
I should see a list of programs with focus area "Weight Loss"

elements.name: Browse programs by multiple filters (difficulty level and focus area)
elements.description: A client should be able to browse programs by multiple filters such as difficulty level and focus area.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I browse the programs and filter by difficulty level "Intermediate" and focus area "Muscle Building"
I should see a list of programs with difficulty level "Intermediate" and focus area "Muscle Building"

elements.name: Enroll in a program
elements.description: A client should be able to enroll in a selected program.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I select a program with difficulty level "Advanced" and focus area "Flexibility"
I click on "Enroll"
I should be successfully enrolled in the selected program

elements.name: View schedule of an enrolled program
elements.description: A client should be able to view the schedule of an enrolled program.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I am enrolled in a program with focus area "Muscle Building"
I should be able to view the program's schedule
I should see the start and end times of the program

elements.name: No programs available for the selected filters
elements.description: A client should be notified if no programs match the selected filters.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I browse the programs and filter by difficulty level "Expert"
I should see a message saying "No programs available for the selected filters"

elements.name: Attempt to enroll in a fully booked program
elements.description: A client should not be able to enroll in a program if it is fully booked.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
the program with difficulty level "Advanced" and focus area "Weight Loss" is fully booked
I attempt to enroll in the program
I should see a message saying "This program is fully booked"

elements.name: Attempt to enroll in the same program multiple times
elements.description: A client should not be able to enroll in the same program more than once.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I am already enrolled in the program with focus area "Flexibility"
I attempt to enroll in the same program again
I should see a message saying "You are already enrolled in this program"

elements.name: Cancel enrollment in a program
elements.description: A client should be able to cancel their enrollment in a program.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I am enrolled in the program with focus area "Muscle Building"
I choose to cancel my enrollment
I should be successfully unenrolled from the program
I should see a confirmation message saying "You have successfully canceled your enrollment"

elements.name: View program details before enrollment
elements.description: A client should be able to view full details of a program before enrolling.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I select the program with focus area "Weight Loss"
I should see the program's details including its difficulty level, schedule, and description

name: Program Exploration and Enrollment
description: Program Exploration and Enrollment should allow clients to browse programs by filters and enroll in them.

elements.name: Track personal fitness milestone (weight)
elements.description: A client should be able to track their weight milestone and view it in their progress section.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I update my weight in my profile
my weight should be saved successfully in my profile
I should be able to view my updated weight in the progress section

elements.name: Track personal fitness milestone (BMI)
elements.description: A client should be able to track their BMI milestone and view it in their progress section.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I update my BMI in my profile
my BMI should be saved successfully in my profile
I should be able to view my updated BMI in the progress section

elements.name: Track personal fitness milestone (attendance)
elements.description: A client should be able to track their attendance in fitness program sessions.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I attend a fitness program session
my attendance should be recorded for the program
I should be able to view my attendance history in the progress section

elements.name: View achievements or badges after completing a program
elements.description: A client should be able to receive an achievement or badge after completing a program and view it in the achievements section.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I complete a fitness program
I should receive an achievement or badge for completing the program
the achievement or badge should appear in the achievements section of my profile

elements.name: View all tracked milestones and achievements
elements.description: A client should be able to view all their tracked milestones and achievements in the progress section.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I view my progress section
I should be able to see my tracked milestones such as weight, BMI, and attendance
I should be able to see the badges or achievements earned for completing programs

elements.name: Enter an invalid weight
elements.description: A client should be informed if they enter an invalid weight value (e.g., negative or extremely high).

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I update my weight to "-10"
I should see an error message saying "Invalid weight value"
my weight should not be saved until a valid value is entered

elements.name: Enter an invalid BMI
elements.description: A client should be informed if they enter an invalid BMI value (e.g., BMI less than 10 or greater than 50).

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I update my BMI to "5"
I should see an error message saying "Invalid BMI value"
my BMI should not be saved until a valid value is entered

elements.name: Failed to record attendance in a session
elements.description: A client should be notified if attendance for a session cannot be recorded.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I attend a fitness program session
the system fails to record my attendance
I should see a message saying "Attendance could not be recorded, please try again"

elements.name: Failure to receive achievement or badge after completing a program
elements.description: A client should be notified if they do not receive an achievement or badge after completing a program.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I complete a fitness program
the system fails to assign an achievement or badge
I should see a message saying "Achievement or badge could not be awarded, please contact support"

elements.name: View progress over time for weight or BMI
elements.description: A client should be able to view how their weight or BMI has changed over time.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I view my progress section
I should see a graph or list showing the changes in my weight and/or BMI over time

elements.name: Remove weight or BMI tracking
elements.description: A client should be able to remove tracking for weight or BMI from their progress section.

steps.name: I am logged in as a Client
I choose to remove weight tracking from my profile
my weight should no longer be tracked and will be removed from the progress section

name: Progress Tracking
description: Progress Tracking should allow clients to track their fitness milestones and view achievements.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I add a new subscription plan with the following details:
the new subscription plan "Premium" for "Client" should be available for selection
I am logged in as an admin
a subscription plan "Basic" for "Instructor" exists
I update the subscription plan "Basic" with the new price "$30/mo"
the subscription plan "Basic" should reflect the updated price "$30/mo"
I am logged in as an admin
a subscription plan "Premium" for "Client" exists
I deactivate the subscription plan "Premium"
the subscription plan "Premium" should no longer be available for new users
existing users with "Premium" plans should retain their benefits until the end of the billing cycle
I am logged in as an admin
I view all subscription plans
I should see a list of all active plans with details:
I am logged in as a user with a "Basic" subscription
I upgrade to a "Premium" subscription
my subscription type should be updated to "Premium"
I should be charged $50 for the current billing cycle
I am logged in as a user with a "Premium" subscription
I downgrade to a "Basic" subscription
my subscription type should be updated to "Basic"
the changes should take effect in the next billing cycle
I am logged in as a user with an active subscription
I cancel my subscription
my subscription should remain active until the end of the billing cycle
I should receive a confirmation message "Your subscription has been canceled and will end on <end_date>."
I am logged in as a user
I view the available subscription plans
I should see a list of plans with details:
I am logged in as a user with a subscription expiring in 7 days
the system generates notifications
I should receive a message "Your subscription will expire on <end_date>. Renew now to avoid interruption."

the user is logged in successfully

"username" is not in the database

name: Login
description: The user wants to access his personal account

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin

elements.name: View statistics of the most popular programs

steps.name: I navigate to the "Program Monitoring Dashboard"
I select the option to view "Most Popular Programs"
I should see a list of programs sorted by enrollment
I am logged in as an admin

elements.name: Generate reports on revenue, attendance, and client progress

steps.name: I am on the "Program Monitoring Dashboard"
I select the option to generate "Program Performance Reports"
I specify the report type as "Revenue"
I should receive a detailed revenue report for all programs
I specify the report type as "Attendance"
I should receive a detailed attendance report for all programs
I specify the report type as "Client Progress"
I should receive a detailed progress report for all enrolled clients
I am logged in as an admin
I am on the "Program Monitoring Dashboard"
I select the option to view "Program Status"
I should see programs categorized by status
I am logged in as an admin
I am on the "Program Monitoring Dashboard"
I click "Export Report"
I select the report type as "Revenue"
a downloadable revenue report should be generated
the file name should include the current date in the format "Revenue_Report_<yyyy-MM-dd>.csv"

name: Program Monitoring
description:
As an admin
  I want to monitor program statistics and generate reports
  So that I can analyze performance and track progress effectively

steps.name: there is a customer with customer ID "id" ,NAME "customer name" , PASSWORD "pass " , phone "phone", address "address"
the customer is registered "customer name"

elements.name: a customer that is already registered

steps.name: there is a customer with customer ID "id" ,NAME "customer name" , PASSWORD "pass " , phone "phone", address "address"
the customer is registered "customer name"

name: Sign-up
description: Sign-up should be quick and user-friendly.

elements.name: Add New User
elements.description: Admin should be able to add new users by entering their details like name, email, role, and password.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I add a new user with valid details
the new user should be created successfully
I should see a success message confirming the addition

elements.name: Update User Details
elements.description: Admin should be able to update a user's information such as role, contact details, and password.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I update the user details with new information
the updated user details should be saved
I should see a confirmation message with the updated information

elements.name: Deactivate User Account
elements.description: Admin should be able to deactivate a user’s account to prevent further access.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I deactivate a user account
the user should be deactivated
I should see a success message confirming the deactivation

elements.name: User Already Exists
elements.description: Admin should be notified when trying to add a user with an email that already exists.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I try to add a new user with an existing email
I should be notified that the email is already registered
I should be asked to choose a different email address

elements.name: Invalid Email Format
elements.description: Admin should be notified when adding a user with an invalid email address.

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I try to add a user with an invalid email address
I should be notified that the email format is invalid
I should be prompted to enter a valid email address

name: User Management
description: Admin should be able to manage user accounts for instructors and clients.
